title: Define Project Requirements (Revised)
description: Gather and document all functional and non-functional requirements, user stories, acceptance criteria, and data models for the MentorshipAlgorithm system. This includes details on the system's architecture, scalability, security, accessibility, and performance considerations. For scalability, consider potential future growth of the user base and the need for horizontally-scalable solutions such as containerization or serverless architectures. For security, address data privacy concerns, compliance with relevant regulations including GDPR, HIPAA, and any other industry-specific requirements. Ensure the system is designed to be accessible according to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG). Also, specify the technologies to be used, considering microservices architecture, serverless functions, and modern web frameworks for both frontend and backend development. Expected performance should include response time goals, throughput expectations, and any specific platform or device compatibility considerations. Provide a high-level overview of the proposed system architecture, including any key components, interfaces, APIs, and data flow diagrams if possible. Moreover, provide a detailed description of each component's functionality and interaction.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Design Database Schema
description: Design the database schema to store user profiles, skills, goals, availability, and mentorship matches.

title: Develop Matching Algorithm
description: Implement the core algorithm that matches mentors and mentees based on the specified criteria.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for mentors and mentees to create profiles, set preferences, and view matches.

title: Implement Authentication and Authorization
description: Implement user authentication and authorization mechanisms to ensure data privacy and security.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Configure a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for automated testing and deployment.

title: Write Test Cases
description: Develop comprehensive test cases to ensure the system meets all requirements and functions as expected.

title: Document System
description: Create user manuals, technical documentation, and other relevant documentation for the MentorshipAlgorithm system.
